summary: A boy obsessed with 50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?
cast: Ethan Hawke|River Phoenix|Jason Presson|Bradley Gregg|Georg Olden|Chance Schwass|Amanda Peterson|Danny Nucci|Dana Ivey|Taliesin Jaffe|James Cromwell|Brooke Bundy|Tricia Bartholome|Eric Luke|Robert Picardo|Karen Mayo-Chandler|Robert F. Boyle|John P. Navin Jr.|Mary Hillstead|Simone Blue|Meshach Taylor|Dick Miller|Leslie Rickert|Frank Welker|Fred Newman|Joan Gerber|Belinda Balaski|Roger Behr|Roger Peltz|Neil Ross|Marilyn Schreffler|Bill Ratner|Jane Kean|Bob Holt|Jay Stewart|John Forker|Mary Kay Place
title: Exploradores
